body.raw:
1. Go to https://clerk.com and create an account

You will be redirected to the Sign In builder page.

2. Choose an application name and customize options if you want. Then, click **Create application**

You will be redirected to your dashboard. There is a section that says API Keys.

3. Copy these values to the appropriate location `.env.local` file.
